title: Base Taxonomy
description: Defines the structure for a complete, named classification taxonomy, such as for physics profiles or emotional valence.

title.description: The human-readable, PascalCase name of the object (e.g., 'UniversalPhysicsState').

description.description: A clear, complete sentence explaining the object's purpose and function within the system.

schema_version.description: The semantic version of this schema definition (e.g., '1.0.0').

taxonomy_id.description: A unique, machine-readable ID for this taxonomy (e.g., 'physics_profile_v1').

levels.description: An ordered list of the levels in this taxonomy.

nodes.description: A list of all possible nodes within this taxonomy.

items.title: Base Taxonomy Node
items.description: Defines the structure for a single node within any given taxonomy.

id.description: The unique ID for this node within its level (e.g., 'simple', 'individual', 'sleep').

level.description: The name of the taxonomy level this node belongs to (e.g., 'cognitive_complexity').

description.title: Description Field
description.description: A canonical, reusable definition for a human-readable description field.

embedding_context.description: OPTIONAL: Rich text fed into a Sentence Transformer to generate the canonical embedding for this concept. Omit for rule-based classifications.

metadata.description: Optional key-value metadata for this node, such as a physics profile affinity or rule-based triggers.
metadata.title: BaseTaxonomyNodeMetadata
